en: This is a development website. We welcome your feedback.
ru: Это сайт находится в разработке. Мы рады вашим отзывам.

en: View all posts in the %category_name category
Click on each goal, or %before_link search, %after_link for %name statistics for Environmental Statistics measures.
ru: Нажмите на каждую цель, или %before_link поищите %after_link статистики для глобальных показателей целей в области устойчивого развития.
%name данные для целей в области устойчивого развития

en: The open-climate platform is under construction.
ru: Цели в области устойчивого развития (ЦУР) представляют собой универсальный призыв к действиям, направленным на то, чтобы покончить с нищетой, защитить планету и улучшить жизнь и перспективы каждого человека, где бы он ни находился. Эти 17 целей были приняты всеми государствами-членами ООН в 2015 году в рамках 2030 Повестки дня в области устойчивого развития.

en: Green house Gas emissions and Short-lived climate pollutant (SLCP) emissions
ru: Green house Gas emissions and Short-lived climate pollutant (SLCP) emissions

en: Spread of climate-sensitive pests and diseases
ru: Spread of climate-sensitive pests and diseases

en: No options available because of filters above
ru: Нет имеющихся вариантов из-за фильтров наверху.
Скачать данные заголовков в формате CSV
Скачать исходные данные в формате CSV

en: There are too many datasets to show on the chart. Not all will be shown until you remove some selections.
ru: В таблице слишком много данных, чтобы показать в графике. Чтобы увидеть все, удалите выделенное.

en: Choose categories from the dropdowns below to see different breakdowns of the data. Some will not be available until a higher level is chosen.
ru: Выберите категории из выпадающего меню внизу, чтобы увидеть разные разбивки данных. Несколько не будет доступно, пока более высокий уровень не выбран.

en: Click on the legend to remove individual lines from the chart.
ru: Нажмите на легенду, чтобы убрать линии из графика.

en: This table provides metadata for the actual indicator available from %country_name statistics closest to the corresponding global SDG indicator. Please note that even when the global SDG indicator is fully available from %country_adjective statistics, this table should be consulted for information on national methodology and other %country_adjective-specific metadata information.
ru: В этой таблице представлены метаданные для фактического показателя, доступного из статистики ближайшей к соответствующему глобальному индикатору ЦУР. Обратите внимание, что даже если глобальный индикатор ЦУР полностью доступен из статистики, по этой таблице следует проконсультироваться для получения информации о национальной методологии и других специфичных метаданных.

en: This table provides information on metadata for SDG indicators as defined by the UN Statistical Commission. Complete global metadata is provided by the UN Statistics Division.
ru: В этой таблице представлена информация для метаданных показателей ЦУР, определенных Статистической комиссией ООН. Полные глобальные метаданные представлены Статистическим отделом ООН.

en: Estimated territorial greenhouse gas emissions by gas
ru: Estimated territorial greenhouse gas emissions by gas

en: UK annual emissions of some pollutants / Concentrations in the atmosphere (TBC)
ru: UK annual emissions of some pollutants / Concentrations in the atmosphere (TBC)

en: Land cover and degraded land area
ru: Land cover and degraded land area

en: Concentrations of GHG and pollutants in the atmosphere, annual means
ru: Concentrations of GHG and pollutants in the atmosphere, annual means

en: Abatement of the number of invasive non-native species entering and establishing against a baseline
ru: Abatement of the number of invasive non-native species entering and establishing against a baseline

en: Distribution of invasive non-native species and plant pests and diseases
ru: Distribution of invasive non-native species and plant pests and diseases

en: Number of countries with sustainable consumption and production (SCP) national action plans or SCP mainstreamed as a priority or a target into national policies
ru: Number of countries with sustainable consumption and production (SCP) national action plans or SCP mainstreamed as a priority or a target into national policies

en: Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development (including climate change education) are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment
ru: Extent to which (i) global citizenship education and (ii) education for sustainable development (including climate change education) are mainstreamed in (a) national education policies; (b) curricula; (c) teacher education; and (d) student assessment

en: Number of countries that have communicated the strengthening of institutional, systemic and individual capacity-building to implement adaptation, mitigation and technology transfer, and development actions
ru: Number of countries that have communicated the strengthening of institutional, systemic and individual capacity-building to implement adaptation, mitigation and technology transfer, and development actions

en: Proportion of national exclusive economic zones managed using ecosystem-based approaches
ru: Proportion of national exclusive economic zones managed using ecosystem-based approaches

ru: Progress by countries in the degree of implementation of international instruments aiming to combat illegal, unreported and unregulated fishing

en: Investments in energy efficiency as a proportion of GDP and the amount of foreign direct investment in financial transfer for infrastructure and technology to sustainable development services
ru: Investments in energy efficiency as a proportion of GDP and the amount of foreign direct investment in financial transfer for infrastructure and technology to sustainable development services

en: Amount of fossil-fuel subsidies per unit of GDP (production and consumption) and as a proportion of total national expenditure on fossil fuels
ru: Amount of fossil-fuel subsidies per unit of GDP (production and consumption) and as a proportion of total national expenditure on fossil fuels

ru: Official development assistance and public expenditure on conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity and ecosystems

ru: Pathogens, air quality and UV radiation

ru: Development in areas at risk of river and coastal flooding

ru: Development and surface water flood risk

ru: Capacity of people and communities to recover from flooding

ru: Water demand in the built environment
